name: Nikakudori Solitaire Lite
description:
A classic solitaire games using Mahjong tiles.
"Nikakudori Solitaire" - Lite Edition

- Lite version limitations -
1.Maximum number of stages: 3 Stages Only. (54 Pattern Games)

- Feature : Full Version "Nikakudori Solitaire" -
1. Infinite stages.
2. 18 different game level: Easy, Normal, Hard × tiles array size.
3. Managing various score.
